thread.title: Man City v Monaco, UEFA Champions League LIVE scores | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Man City v Monaco, UEFA Champions League LIVE scores | Daily Mail Online

author: Dan Ripley For Mailonline
title: Man City v Monaco, UEFA Champions League LIVE scores | Daily Mail Online
text:
The Etihad Stadium is set for another night of European action The Etihad Stadium will host the Champions League clash between Manchester City and Monaco The scoreboard inside the Etihad Stadium shows the badges for both sides Champions League branding is also placed on the tunnel entrance for the players 17:57 Who fancies a few goals to fly in this evening then? 
Then you may just be in luck. As good as Manchester City are going forward they haven't quite got it together defensively yet under Pep Guardiola, and this evening they take on a side that have already scored 108 goals across all competitions this season... 
So good evening all and welcome to Sportsmail's live coverage of Manchester City v Monaco as the Champions League returns... {"id":"4245832","channel":"/sport","pageUrl":"http://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-4245832/Man-City-v-Monaco-UEFA-Champions-League-LIVE-scores.html","status":"running","greenBox":{"body":""},"modifiedOrder":1} 0 0
